item.title: Assalamu AlaikkumÂ
item.dc:creator: Aiman Athambawa
item.description: My Dear Brothers and Sisters, After a great effort, we have successfully launching the website. Alhamdulillah. May this site stays up to date, informative, content rich and serve to Sri Lanka Muslim community in East London.
item.content:encoded:
My Dear Brothers and Sisters,

After a great effort, we have successfully launching the website. Alhamdulillah.

May this site stays up to date, informative, content rich and serve to Sri Lanka Muslim community in East London.
